notes: USA-based DIY cosmetics supplier offering water-soluble Ginseng Extract for facial products and hair care. Serves DIY cosmetics market, small-scale brands, and indie formulators. Applications: facial products (2-5%), hair care (1-3%), anti-aging skincare. Water-soluble for easy incorporation. Retail and bulk pricing available with small quantities (4oz-1 gallon). USA-based distribution with international shipping. Usage instructions and formulation tips provided. Multiple size options ideal for testing and small-batch production.
